Name: renal fibrosis
Definition: A kidney disease that is characterized by progressive detrimental connective tissue deposition of the kidney parenchyma leading to deterioration of renal function.

Name: familial juvenile hyperuricemic nephropathy
Definition: A kidney disease that is characterized by hyperuricemia with renal uric acid under-excretion

Name: obstructive nephropathy
Definition: A kidney disease characterized by kidney damage and dysfunction resulting from urinary tract obstruction.

Name: renal hypoplasia
Definition: A kidney disease that is characterized by abnormally small kidneys with normal morphology and reduced number of nephrons.

Name: renal hypertension
Definition: A parasitic protozoa infectious disease that involves infection of the small intestine by a single-celled enteric protozoan parasite Giardia intestinalis. The symptoms include greasy and malodorous stools

Name: obsolete nodular lung tuberculosis
Definition: A pulmonary tuberculosis presenting as multiple bilateral large nodules in the lungs.

Name: kidney failure
Definition: A kidney disease characterized by the failure of the kidneys to adequately filter waste products from the blood.

Name: nephritis
Definition: A kidney disease that is characterized by an inflammation of the kidneys.

Name: impaired renal function disease
Definition: A selective immunoglobulin deficiency disease that is caused by a reduction in some types of gamma globulins.

Name: secondary hyperparathyroidism of renal origin
Definition: An anemia that is characterized by a reduction in the number of red blood cells

Name: hemolytic-uremic syndrome
Definition: A kidney disease that is characterized by hemolytic anemia

Name: obsolete acute renal failure with lesion of renal cortical necrosis
Definition: A kidney disease that is characterized by hemolytic anemia

Name: nephrocalcinosis
Definition: A primary systemic mycosis that results_in a systemic fungal infection

Name: atheroembolism of kidney
Definition: A thyroid gland disease which involves an underproduction of thyroid hormone.

Name: renal agenesis
Definition: A renal disease that is characterized by the failure of one or both kidneys to develop.

Name: kidney cancer
Definition: A urinary system cancer that is located_in the kidney.

Name: obsolete papillary cystadenoma
Definition: A urinary system cancer that is located_in the kidney.

Name: obsolete serous cystadenoma
Definition: A urinary system cancer that is located_in the kidney.

Name: pyelitis
Definition: An inherited metabolic disorder that involves elevated levels of bilirubin resulting from disruption of bilirubin metabolism.

Name: kidney cortex necrosis
Definition: An autosomal recessive disease that has_material_basis_in rare mutations in two DNA excision repair proteins

Name: obsolete multicystic dysplastic kidney
Definition: An autosomal recessive disease that has_material_basis_in rare mutations in two DNA excision repair proteins

Name: cystic kidney disease
Definition: An autosomal recessive disease that has_material_basis_in rare mutations in two DNA excision repair proteins

Name: obsolete glomerular vascular disorder
Definition: An autosomal recessive disease that has_material_basis_in rare mutations in two DNA excision repair proteins

Name: kidney papillary necrosis
Definition: A lacrimal gland carcinoma that derives_from epithelial cells of glandular origin.

Name: perinephritis
Definition: A lacrimal gland carcinoma that derives_from epithelial cells of glandular origin.

Name: anuria
Definition: A lacrimal gland carcinoma that derives_from epithelial cells of glandular origin.

Definition: A lacrimal gland carcinoma that derives_from epithelial cells of glandular origin.

Name: stricture or kinking of ureter
Definition: A fibrosarcoma that is located_in the dermis laryer of the skin and that begins as a hard nodule and grows slowly.

Name: renal tubular transport disease
Definition: An adenocarcinoma that derives_from epithelial cells which have clear cytoplasm.

Name: proteinuria
Definition: A kidney disease that is characterized by the presence of excess proteins in the urine.

Name: acute urate nephropathy
Definition: A hematologic cancer and central nervous system neoplasm that is located_in the central nervous system.

Name: obsolete hepatoblastoma with combined fetal epithelial differentiation
Definition: A hematologic cancer and central nervous system neoplasm that is located_in the central nervous system.

Name: nephrolithiasis
Definition: A coronary artery disease characterized by myocardial cell death (myocardial necrosis) due to prolonged ischaemia.

Name: renal infectious disease
Definition: A Cytomegalovirus infectious disease that results_in infection

Name: diabetes insipidus
Definition: A pituitary gland disease characterized by the decreased secretion of one or more of the eight hormones normally produced by the pituitary gland.

Name: orthostatic proteinuria
Definition: A primary bacterial infectious disease that results_in infection located_in intestine caused by eating food contaminated with enterotoxins produced by bacteria

Name: kidney hypertrophy
Definition: A ureteral disease characterized by backward flow of urine from the urinary bladder into the ureter.

Definition: An urogenital tuberculosis that results_in formation of granulomas located_in kidney.
